attributes.action: Well, someone in the IT dept., preferably...Exercise more control over the content of petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Some of the petitions here are devaluing the purpose of having this forum.  Would anyone seriously bother to create a petition for the petty matters raised if they had to do anything more complex than type a message?  A large number of these "petitions" are very obviously rants from people who have just encountered a slow driver/scratchy sweater/rubbish cheapo wardrobe.  It takes too long to scroll through the rubbish.  How about having a separate section for "Aimless Whining"?

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
